titles.title: Come, let us join our cheerful songs

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}“Worthy the Lamb that’s gone on high, To be exalted thus!” “Worthy the Lamb that died!” we cry, “For He was slain for us.”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let all that dwell above the sky, And air, and earth, and seas, Conspire to lift thy glories high, And speak thine endless praise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The whole creation joins in one To bless the sacred name Of him that sits upon the throne, And to adore the Lamb.{/lang-eng}
